thread.title: Sen. Jeff Flake Asked Gorsuch the ‘100 Duck-Sized Horses or 1 Horse-Sized Duck’ Question
thread.title_full: Sen. Jeff Flake Asked Gorsuch the ‘100 Duck-Sized Horses or 1 Horse-Sized Duck’ Question

author: Josh Feldman
title: Sen. Jeff Flake Asked Gorsuch the ‘100 Duck-Sized Horses or 1 Horse-Sized Duck’ Question
text:
Sen. Jeff Flake Asked Gorsuch the ‘100 Duck-Sized Horses or 1 Horse-Sized Duck’ Question by Josh Feldman | 6:14   
In a lighter moment of the day, Senator Jeff Flake asked Supreme Court nominee Neil Gorsuch a few questions sent to him by members of his family, including one from his teenage son: 
“Ask him if he would rather fight 100 duck-sized horses or 1 horse-sized duck.” 
The question is a popular meme on Reddit, which Flake cited as he tried to offer some context. 
Watch how Gorsuch answered above, via C-SPAN 3. 
[ image via screengrab ]
